text: Which of the following is NOT a valid way to set style properties in UI Toolkit?
feedbackCorrect: In UI Toolkit, you can set style properties using a UXML file, a USS file, or a C# script. However, UI Toolkit does not support setting style properties using a GUI Style (IMGUI), as it uses a separate system for styling UI elements.
feedbackIncorrect: In UI Toolkit, you can set style properties using a UXML file, a USS file, or a C# script. UI Toolkit does not support setting style properties using a GUI Style, as this is part of Unity's older, immediate mode GUI system (IMGUI).
